#labels Featured,Phase-Deploy
#describes how to install and configure ruijieclient

=How To Install=

 ==install from source package==
  * general installation
{{{
./configure
make
make install
}}}
  * ini tpye configuration file (optional, thus libxml2 will not be necessary for executing)
   search the following line in config.c
{{{
  //#define DEBUG_NOXML
}}}
   replace it with
{{{
  #define DEBUG_NOXML
}}}
   and then compile it according to general installation steps mentioned above.

 ==install from complied package(rpm, deb etc..)==
  exert your package managing program to install it.

=Particular Configuring Instructions to Particular Versions=

 ==Version 0.7, 0.1.1==

  * simplify startup procedure (optional, if ruijieclient is installed from compiled packages(deb, rpm) which is downloaded from ruijieclient website, this step can be skipped )
   Thus, prefix 'sudo' is not necessary to executing ruijieclient next time.
{{{
sudo chmod 4755 /usr/local/bin/ruijieclient
}}}
  * generate configuration template (needed the first time you use it)
{{{
sudo ruijieclient -g
}}}
  * edit configuration
{{{
sudo gedit /etc/ruijie.conf
}}}
  * configuration file format specification
      * xml(default)
{{{
<?xml version="1.0" ?>
<ruijie.conf version="0.1.1">
  <!--This is a sample configuration file of RuijieClient, change it appropriately according to your settings.-->
  <account>
    <Name>123012007078</Name>
    <Password>888888</Password>
  </account>
  <settings>
    <!--0: Standard, 1: Private-->
    <AuthenticationMode>1</AuthenticationMode>
    <NIC>eth0</NIC>
    <EchoInterval>4</EchoInterval>
    <!--IntelligentReconnect: 0: Disable IntelligentReconnect, 1: Enable IntelligentReconnect -->
    <IntelligentReconnect>1</IntelligentReconnect> 
    <!--AutoConnect: 0: Disable AutoConnect, 1: Enable AutoConnect (only available in gruijieclient) -->
    <AutoConnect>0</AutoConnect>
    <!--Fake Version for cheating server-->
    <FakeVersion>3.99</FakeVersion>
    <!--Fake IP for cheating server-->
    <FakeAddress></FakeAddress>
    <!--DHCP mode 0: Disable, 1: Enable DHCP before authentication, 2: Enable DHCP after authentication 3: DHCP after DHCP authentication andre-authentication(You should use this if your net env is DHCP)-->
    <DHCPmode>0</DHCPmode>
    <!--Add if you don't want ruijieclient to ping the default gateway-->
    <PingHost>4.2.2.2</PingHost> # this is the testing hose address for detecting the accessibility of network.
  </settings>
</ruijie.conf>
}}}
      * ini configuration(e.g. being used in embeded devices )
{{{
[ruijieclient]
Name=123012007078
Password=888888
#This is settings
#Network Adapter Name
NIC=eth0
#0: Standard, 1: Private
AuthenticationMode=1
EchoInterval=25
#IntelligentReconnect: 0: Disable IntelligentReconnect, 1: Enable IntelligentReconnect
IntelligentReconnect=1
#AutoConnect: 0: Disable AutoConnect, 1: Enable AutoConnect (only available in gruijieclient) 
AutoConnect=0
#Fake Version for cheating server
FakeVersion=3.99
#Fake IP for cheating server
FakeAddress=123.123.123.123
#DHCP mode 0: Disable, 1: Enable DHCP before authentication, 2: Enable DHCP after authentication 3: DHCP after DHCP authentication andre-authentication(You should use this if your net env is DHCP)
DHCPmode=0
#Add if you don't want ruijieclient to ping the default gateway
PingHost=202.102.154.3
}}}
